summary:
Рон: этот МАЛФОЙ придурок.
Гарри: ага. 
Рон: как он мог. ХОРЁК несчастный.
Гарри: ага.
Джинни: но задница у него...
body:
Рон: этот МАЛФОЙ придурок.

Гарри: ага.

Рон: как он мог. ХОРЁК несчастный.

Гарри: ага.

Джинни: но задница у него зачётная.

Гарри: не смей так говорить УИЗЛИ. МАЛФОЙ только мой. Поняла.

Джинни: я говорила тебе Рон что они встречаются.

summary:
James and Lily's Wedding 
I will trust you and honor you,
I will laugh with you and cry with you.
Through the best and the...
body:
James and Lily’s Wedding

I will trust you and honor you,

I will laugh with you and cry with you.

Through the best and the worst,

Through the difficult and the easy.

Whatever may come I will always be there.

As I have given you my hand to hold

So I give you my life to keep

____________

Happy Birthday @beaubcxton sweetie 😘

blog.name: lady-charinette
blog.title: Be kind, everyone is fighting a hard battle
blog.description: Female/Passionate amateur writer, sometimes fandom theorist, mostly writer

tags: crossover harry potter my hero academia
summary: Couldn't decide between the two so I posted both.  I noticed a lot of fans comparing Bakugou to Sasuke, but to me he seems more...
caption:
Couldn’t decide between the two so I posted both. 

I noticed a lot of fans comparing Bakugou to Sasuke, but to me he seems more like Draco Malfoy from Harry Potter than anything. 

While their upbrining is different, I think their goals and innermost feelings are somewhat the same or at least similar. 

“I felt I had no choice, so I followed the only way that was left even if it wasn’t my own way.” (Draco)

“I felt like the worst, so I always acted like I was the best.” (Bakugou)

Both acted the way people expected of them, both felt like they had NO CHOICE but to be that way. 

We don’t really know the innermost details of Bakugou’s upbringing, all we know was that in kindergarten, when he discovered his quirk and everyone adored him and told him how awesome he was, his superiority (and after meeting Deku, inferiority) complex started developing. It felt good to be praised, adored, he was just a child so that developed out of control in later years. 

While I don’t think his parents are neccessarily bad ones, I do think they unknowingly helped feed his complexes. The fact that Bakugou’s mom hitting him as a form of discipline is showed more as comedic relief but what if all those times, Bakugou thought:“She’s hitting me because I didn’t do good enough.” whereas Bakugou’s mom actually had the goal to “beat out” his asshole attitude and set him straight. While their intentions may have been good, they may have been executed poorly or simply didnt have the desired effect on Bakugou as they have hoped.

I’m not saying I approve of Bakugou bullying poor Deku, not at all, but the way I see it, in Kacchan’s twisted mind he viewed Deku as a threat (especially once they met in U.A.), a threat to the perfect existence he had until then. The illusion bubble finally, slowly started crumbling when he met all those other heroes in training at U.A., realizing he wasn’t the best like he thought he was and the continous experience is slowly humbling and developing him (like we see hints of it in season 3).

Draco is another story entirely, he had been a sweet child (even being something like friends with Hermione) before his father took a far too active role in raising him the way HE wanted, a Slytherin prince, a Death Eater. (ugh) All Draco knew in his life had been strict rules, punishments if he “acted out of line” (trying to be a normal kid), so that was all he knew. You could argue that once he reached adulthood, he could have broken free from them and support Harry & Co. sooner but…

The life, while wrong and horrible, he led at his home with all the other Death Eater asses, was all he knew and who would even think of the scary thought of going against their own family, their whole way of life, to support something he was raised to believe was silly, false, wrong or a blissful, unfanthomable idea? 

I never liked the way Draco treated Hermione, Harry or Ron but…with different parents he wouldn’t have become like that in the first place.

“I felt like the worst, so I always acted like I was the best.” (Bakugou)

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: imagine being in Ravenclaw and going back to your common room stumbling drunk in the middle of the night after a magical night...
body:
imagine being in Ravenclaw and going back to your common room stumbling drunk in the middle of the night after a magical night of partying and having to answer a fucking riddle in order to get to your own bedroom?

“what gets wetter and wetter the more it dries?”

Your mom eeeyyyyyy

tags: fantastic beast the crimes of grindelwald
title: Fantastic Beast 2 Early Reviews
body:
The early reviews for Fantastic Beasts Crimes of Grindelwald are in and they are not that good. Most seem to be very mixed and average none seem to really hate or love it. It is being said fans of the first and fans of the Harry Potter universe still should see it. It is full of action set pieces with no time to breath and stuffed with characters. The magic is said to not be what we expected. It has a 57% on Rotten Tomatoes.

https://screenrant.com/fantastic-beasts-2-crimes-grindelwald-early-reviews-preview/
